item.speedrunnermod.eye_of_annul.tooltip: Gives the user the exact distance
of the nearest stronghold, in blocks.
item.speedrunnermod.boat.tooltip: A boat that can be ridden in lava.
item.speedrunnermod.speedrunners_workben: also the job site block for
item.speedrunnermod.eye_of_inferno.looki: Eye of Inferno is now looking for a %s!

advancements.speedrunnermod.title: Speedrunner Mod
advancements.speedrunnermod.description: The mod that makes speedrunning, easier
advancements.speedrunnermod.speedrunning: Obtain a Speedrunner Ingot. It's iron, but better
advancements.speedrunnermod.wasteland.de: Set afoot in the Speedrunner's Wasteland biome
advancements.speedrunnermod.suited_for_s: Protect yourself with a piece of speedrunner armor
advancements.speedrunnermod.bulked.title: Bulked
speedrunnermod.title: Speedrunner Mod
speedrunnermod.title.options.tooltip: Open the Speedrunner Mod's options page...
speedrunnermod.options.structure_spawn_r:
Change how often structures spawn.
§lDefault = §aCommon§r

Note: Higher spawn rates may cause lag and increase load time.
speedrunnermod.options.better_biomes.too:
Allows certain biomes, such as plains, deserts, savannas, etc. to generate more commonly.

This can come in handy when speedrunning.
speedrunnermod.options.item_tooltips.too: Adds helpful tooltips to certain speedrunner mod items.
speedrunnermod.options.icarus_mode.toolt: Grants the player with an Elytra and firework rockets upon world creation.
speedrunnermod.options.infini_pearl_mode: Upon world creation, grants the player with an ender pearl that does not get consumed or inflict damage upon use.
speedrunnermod.options.faster_block_brea: Allows certain blocks to be broken more quickly.
speedrunnermod.options.kill_ghast_on_fir: Kills ghasts when they shoot a fireball, no questions asked.
Set the maximum amount of strongholds that can generate in a world.

§lNote:§r The smaller the number, the more spread out the strongholds will be.
speedrunnermod.options.dragon_perch_time: Set the amount of time that it takes for the ender dragon to automatically perch upon entering the end.
speedrunnermod.options.fast_world_creati: Adds a button that allows you to create worlds in just one click.
speedrunnermod.options.gamemode.tooltip: Set the gamemode when creating a world from the mod's one-click world creation button.
speedrunnermod.options.difficulty.toolti: Set the difficulty when creating a world from the mod's one-click world creation button.
speedrunnermod.options.allow_cheats.tool: Enables cheats when creating a world from the mod's one-click world creation button.
speedrunnermod.options.mob_spawner_max_s: Sets the maximum time it takes for spawner blocks to spawn mobs.
speedrunnermod.options.mob_spawning_rate: Controls how often passive mobs spawn. This can help with lag.
speedrunnermod.options.custom_biomes.too: Allows the §b"Speedrunner Wasteland"§r biome to generate, and allows additional features to be added to different biomes.
speedrunnermod.options.common_ores.toolt: Allows certain ores to generate more commonly.
speedrunnermod.options.allow_boats_in_la: Allows the §bspeedrunner,§r §ccrimson§r and §9warped§r boats to be ridden in lava.
speedrunnermod.options.allow_water_in_ne: Allows water to be placed in the nether.
speedrunnermod.options.generate_speedrun: Allows the §bspeedrunner trees§r to generate throughout the world, disable if you think they are too overpowered or are noticing lag.
speedrunnermod.options.better_foods.tool: Changes foods saturation, hunger, and status effects and buffs them. This includes modded food items.
speedrunnermod.options.item_buffs.toolti: Allows certain items to apply status effects and/or modify the movement of the player.
speedrunnermod.options.stronghold_distan:
Manually change how far apart strongholds can generate in worlds.

§lNote:§r The larger the number, more strongholds can generate further out in the world.
speedrunnermod.options.mod_button_type.t:
Change the main option button type for the speedrunner mod.
Logo = small, squared button with mod icon.
Button = large, rectangular button.
speedrunnermod.options.item_messages.too: Choose whether messages from Inferno, Annul and Speedrunner Eyes should be sent to the chat or in the actionbar (above your hotbar).
speedrunnermod.options.social_buttons.to: Enable/disable the social buttons across different screens.
speedrunnermod.options.block_particles.t: Applies particles to certain ores and blocks in the §bSpeedrunner's Wasteland§r biome. Disable if you are noticing lag.
speedrunnermod.options.nether_stronghold:
Allows §lstrongholds§r to generate in §cthe nether.§r

§lNote:§r This can cause broken world generation, so enable at your own risk.
speedrunnermod.options.global_nether_por: Allows nether portals to be created in all dimensions, including the end.
speedrunnermod.reset_options_confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the Speedrunner Mod settings back to default?
You may need to restart your game for changes to take full effect. Continue?
speedrunnermod.restart_required.line1: Changes you made will require a restart to take full effect.
speedrunnermod.menu.features.coming_soon: These screens are still a W.I.P. Coming soon :)
speedrunnermod.features.blocks_and_items: These can be obtained from the §bSpeedrunner Ores§r that generate around the world,
and from loot chests as well. They can be used to craft a variety of different things,
and they can also be used to craft anything that you can craft with §liron ingots.
Also found in loot chests, these can be obtained from §b9 speedrunner ingots,
and can also be used to craft anythingthat §liron nuggets§r can.
These can only be obtained from crafting by using §b9 speedrunner ingots,
and can also be used to craft anything that you can craft with §liron blocks.
Found in the §l§bSpeedrunner's Wasteland§r biome, as well as in other parts of the world,
the speedrunner wood can be used to craft anything that normal wood could.
It can also be used as a §lfuel source,§r but §6cannot burn from lava.
Along with the §bspeedrunner boat,§r there are now also §ccrimson§r and §9warped§r boats.
They can be crafted just like any ordinary boat, and can also be used in lava.
These can only be obtained from the §lIgneous Ores§r that generate around the world,
and can only be used for one thing: §ocrafting obsidian.
If you're ever having trouble obtaining obsidian, just look for these ores around the world,
and you can get some obsidian just like that.
The §ceye of inferno§r acts like an §aeye of ender,§r but different. Instead of locating the nearest stronghold,
it locates the nearest §cnether fortress,§r or §7bastion,§r it's your choice.
Just shift and right-click to swap between the two structures.
The §deye of annul§r also acts just like an §aeye of ender,§r but in addition,
it tells you the §oexact distance§r of the nearest stronghold, in blocks.
Acts just like an §aeye of ender,§r but only locates overworld structures such as
§6villages,§r §druined portals,§r §eshipwrecks,§r §9ocean monuments,§r §6woodland mansions§r and §6desert temples.
Found only in loot chests, the §bspeedrunner bulk§r is a very powerful food item
that gives §6fire resistance§r and §9water breathing,§r and also has a chance to give §bspeed,§r
§ehaste,§r and §cregeneration§r when eaten.
Crafted with §b2 speedrunner ingots§r and §b4 speedrunner planks,
the §bSpeedrunner Workbench§r acts just like a smithing table,
but is also the job site block for a §rRetired Speedrunner villager.
Place this near a villager, and get access to the §lmost overpowered trades in the game.
Crafted from §68 gold ingots§r and the respective food item,
these powerful foods give the player §lmore saturation§r and §lhunger§r than the original food would.
To read about more features, refer to the buttons below.
The §bspeedrunner armor§r acts almost like iron armor, but slightly more powerful.
It applies more protection and has more durability, and can be crafted
just like any other armor piece would, using §bspeedrunner ingots.
This is basically an upgrade for the normal §6golden armor.§r It has more durability than normal gold,
it's faster than normal gold, and it can §lkeep you safe from piglin.
speedrunnermod.features.ores_and_worldge: This biome will generate commonly throughout the overworld,
a great place for speedrunning, because mobs spawn less (except for enderman),
diamonds generate more commonly, and of course, this is where you find the §bspeedrunner trees.
If you ever want to feel safe while speedrunning, this is the perfect place to go.
Found across all biomes in the overworld and the nether, the §bspeedrunner ores§r can be used to craft
all of the speedrunner tools, blocks, and armor, and can also be found more commonly
in the §bSpeedrunner's Wasteland§r biome. Ingots and nuggets can also be found in loot chests.
Found across all biomes in the overworld and the nether, §7igneous ores§r drop §7igneous rocks,
which you already know can be used to craft obsidian, making getting to the nether much easier!
That's right, §lores of all types generate more commonly throughout the world.
This includes iron, diamonds, speedrunner ores, redstone, lapis, and everything else!
Now you can get stacked items, in just a few minutes!
§o(This can be disabled in the §b§oadvanced speedrunner mod options menu).
Structures of almost all types will generate more commonly!
No more searching for the buried bastions and far away nether fortresses.
§o(This can be disabled in the §b§ospeedrunner mod options menu).
These so important structures have been changed with this mod, to make navigating them much easier.
Nether fortresses are much smaller now, and contain more than 2 blaze spawners per fortress.
Treasure bastions will now generate with a §6blaze spawner§r at the bottom, instead of magma cubes.
Finally, strongholds are much smaller, each containing more than 1 portal room.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.re: Automatically create a new world in the press of a button,
You can set this to whatever you'd like in the §l"Controls"§r menu.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.fo: Automatically enable/disable Minecraft's distant fog in the press of a button,
You can also change this to whatever you'd like in the §l"Controls" menu.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.fa: Certain blocks can be broken at a much faster rate,
including wood, stone, ores, netherrack, end stone, and much more!
§o(This can be disabled in the §b§ospeedrunner mod options menu).
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.ic: Give yourself a head start with an §lunbreakable elytra§r and a §lstack§r of §lfirework rockets!
You can enable this feature through the §bspeedrunner mod options menu.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.in: Give yourself an ender pearl that causes no damage and lasts forever
everytime you create a new world.
You can enable this feature through the §bspeedrunner mod options menu.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.pi: Piglin bartering is §lEXTREMELY overpowered.§r Ender pearls are much more common,
along with some other useful items, and they can even give you golden apples! :0
Minecraft left the piglins out, so I took care of that.
Upon death, piglins will drop piglin pork, which is basically an alternative for porkchop.
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.tr: Everything drops x3 more than it would normally drop.
This includes ore experience, mob experience, mob drops, and more!
speedrunnermod.features.miscellaneous.mo: This in-game menu only scratches the surface of what this mod has to offer,
So if you want to view a list of §oALL§r of the features, refer to the button below!
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.sodi: A mod that improves the frame rate and fixes graphical issues.
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.lith: Another mod that improves the games performance.
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.phos: A mod that saves CPU usage and optimizes Minecraft's lightning engine.
speedrunnermod.title.resources.mods.kryp: A mod that optimizes Minecraft's networking stack.
Learn the different types of bastions, and how to navigate them.
Learn how to properly navigate through nether fortresses.
Learn how to find structures through walls.
Learn how to "blind travel" to the nearest stronghold.
Learn how to kill the ender dragon in one cycle.
Learn how to use the "pie chart" to find nearby structures.
Learn how to locate a buried treasure without a map!
Check out this video by "Penny" to learn some more.
speedrunnermod.menu.socials.discord.tool: Join the §9§lDiscord§r server for more exciting stuff.
speedrunnermod.dillon8775_youtube.toolti: Check out the creator of this mod, §lDillon8775 §r(me)! :)
speedrunnermod.mannyqueso_youtube.toolti: Check out the creator of some of these textures, §6§lMannyQUESO! §r:)
speedrunnermod.nuzland_youtube.tooltip: Check out my other friend's channel, §b§lNuzLand! §r:)
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line2: I don't think you understand what you're doing.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line3: Okay, fine. You want to understand §cDoom Mode?
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line5: The end fight... well good luck with that.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line6: But most importantly... expect the unexpected.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line8: There's nothing else to it, so beat it!
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line10: Ok fine, you want to know all the secrets?
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line11: A giant and a wither spawn in the end.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line12: They all have an extremely high amount of health, including the ender dragon.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line13: So... I suggest you get the maximum amount of protection you can get.
speedrunnermod.doom_mode_screen.line14: Oh yeah, ender eyes explode and ender pearls give blindness.
speedrunnermod.create_world_button.desc: Press to automatically create a new world!
speedrunnermod.create_world_button.disab: Turn on "§lFast World Creation§r" to use this feature.
